item.description:
How about some hangar flying? Don't think we've ever just sat around and told lies about our flying abilities. We can meet at Bullocks Hangar, order some pizzas and ...

 Mark Estabrook and Matt Scales Have been asking for something like this. Some topics could be, " what would happen if..." , or, " has anyone ever really...", then the question I get all the time, " did you really...".

We could get into IFR stuff too and discuss things like, " isn't that approach a ...", or the ever popular, " if you're in and out of the clouds alot, doesn't that...".

 Course, bring your own topics too. " ever been scared doing that", or "as a student pilot, that always scared me big time".. 

 You all get my wind correction...

All welcome, from ATP to Maybe I'll Be A Student Soon. Charley, Matt and Mark!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Hangar flying for us Dummies aka "did you ever wonder..."
